title: Please help me identify this font style
author: blckhwk

comments.content: Well... Blurry, very small, no distinctive letters part of the /M... Could be a lot of things... As always, [Helvetica Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725032049/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/helvetica+neue) might do the job as well as [Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725032049/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/univers), [Arial](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725032049/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/arial) or [Trade Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725032049/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/trade+gothic).
